dadhAtiq parA#cImEqvAsmAqn-nir.Ru#tiqM praNu#daqtE &pra#tIkShaqmA ya#ntiq nir.Ru#tyA aqntar.hi#tyai mArjayiqtvOpa# tiShThantE mEddhyaqtvAyaq gAr.ha#patyaqmupa# tiShThantE nir.Ruti lOqka Eqva ca#riqtvA pUqtA dE#valOqkamuqpAva#rtantaq EkaqyOpa# tiShThanta Ekaqdhaiva yaja#mAnE vIqrya#M dadhati niqvESa#naH saq~ggama#nOq vasU#nAqmityA#ha praqjA vai paqSavOq vasu# praqjayaiqvaina#M paqSuBiqH sama#d^^rdhayanti || 24
(RuqtuBi# - rEqShA- parA#cIqrupAq - ShTAca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A4)
